thread.title: Climb Real Estate Welcomes Sales Associate Lucas Sorah
thread.title_full: Climb Real Estate Welcomes Sales Associate Lucas Sorah

author: Media Relations
title: Climb Real Estate Welcomes Sales Associate Lucas Sorah
text:
San Francisco-based Climb Real Estate is pleased to announce their affiliation with Lucas Sorah, who will join the real estate team as Sales Associate. An accomplished residential real estate agent, Sorah comes to Climb with over 5 years of sales experience in residential general brokerage. Sorah works with both buyers and sellers of single-family homes and condos all over San Francisco. "I came to Climb because they are on the cutting edge in San Francisco real estate and are continuously striving to be the most unique brokerage around," he said.
Lucas Sorah will be joining Climb as a member of Top Producer Danielle Lazier's real estate team, the SFHotlist collective, which also includes Climb Real Estate agents Michael Minson, Sasha Lupercio, Debbie Rutledge, and Mike Schmidt. They are Climb's #1 top producing real estate team for 2014, with over $73 million in sales last year, and the team's founder Danielle Lazier is among the top ten real estate agents in San Francisco.
Lazier said, "Lucas is a class act! Having grown up in a California real estate family, Lucas has years of sales and leasing experience under his belt and is well-positioned to take over the SF market. He's a welcome addition to our team!"
Born and raised in Southern California, Sorah began his real estate career shadowing his father, who is a prominent Orange County real estate broker. He then transitioned into residential leasing with one of the country's largest developers, The Irvine Company. After that, Sorah went into business with his father specializing in residential sales, where he had a very successful run of selling high-end luxury homes. Two years later, Sorah moved to San Francisco and fell in love with both the city's character and its dynamic real estate market.
Michelle Balog, Climb's Managing Sales Director, said, "Lucas Sorah is our newest Climber in the rapidly growing Climb team and we couldn't be happier to have this Southern Californian decide to make his new home in San Francisco and with Climb family. Real estate is in his blood, so his career choice comes as no surprise. His talent, passion, and attentiveness to his clients' needs will most definitely set the stage for rapid ascent to the top in our San Francisco market."
Lucas Sorah currently lives in Mission Dolores with his partner and their dog Sophie. He loves everything that involves the water and tries to sneak in a few tropical beach getaways each year. Sorah also has a passion for good California wines and enjoys taking his dog for walks around the city.
ABOUT CLIMB REAL ESTATE
Climb Real Estate is a recognized leader in the marketing and sales of Bay Area residential real estate. The San Francisco-based independent and locally-owned brokerage is proud to be the leader in the purchase and sale of a diverse array of homes: from $80,000 parking spots to million-dollar mansions, new development studios to luxurious view penthouses, live/work lofts to charming bungalows and single-family homes. With over 11 years of experience in marketing and collective sales in excess of a billion dollars, Climb Real Estate offers unparalleled marketing and sales expertise with offices in Potrero Hill, Noe Valley, Mission Bay, and Oaklandâ€™s Jack London Square.
